name: Planetary cook
description:
This game was made during the BlendingJam2018 with "A million degrees" as theme.

 You're in space, there's a sun, it's hungry. Just feed him some planets or shoot it to him trough multiple object like a tennis racket or cook them first with your frying pan ! Who knows what happens when a sun reaches a million degrees ?

*Sadly, the game is not downloadable*
